biography:
McComas graduated from Princeton High School in Sharonville, Ohio in 1988. She was an education major at Miami University before she started stripping and modeling. She operated a stripping business that provided strippers to clients in the Cincinnati area in the early 90s.

The majority of her work consisted of nude modeling and acting in a variety of softcore erotic productions in addition to parts in B-movies and TV programs. She relocated to Florida in 2005 and passed away in 2009 in Waverly, Virgina of a longtime illness.
name: Lorissa McComas
